resources.string: Both basic and plus service are enabled, this will cause conflict, please disable one.
An service error is detected, which maybe caused by the application being cleaned up abnormally, please refer to the instructions for keeping the background in the help.
%1$s requires the plus service. You need to manually disable the basic service in the Android settings and then enable the plus service.
You can goto system setting to change service type.
Please enable Micro Gesture here(Basic or Plus service).
Achieved by sending the multitasking key twice, the delay between the keys can be configured in the lab.
Wifi cannot be toggled directly on Android 10+
Scrolling by directly adjusting the scroll bar.
The one-handed mode of some phones will cause some functions of the Micro Gesture to fail (volumn triggering, simulated gestures, etc.), use it carefully.
Switch between normal, silent and vibration
Record an arbitrary screen click, long press or swipe gesture.
Some system gestures cannot be disabled.
Append text at the current editor
Modify the label and code of the action.
Apps in the panel can trigger a small window by long pressing.
Simulates a screen mouse for easy one-handed operation
After paused, other gestures are invalid, and once triggered again, they can be recovered.
All gestures are disabled after stop and can only be restored via the ui or quick switch tile.
Provided by third-party apps, some may not work properly.
Need Android %1$s to support this feature.
Please click the right switch to enable customization.
Disable or custom gestures for each app

Thank you for using Micro Gesture, we take your personal information and privacy protection very seriously. To better protect your rights, please read the privacy policy in its entirety, and start using.

Micro Gesture requires accessibility services permission to perform actions like back, multitasking, notification etc.

We do not collect any personal information through accessiblity services.
Download historical versions and communicate with developers, QQ group number 781012688.
Guards the device battery and extends the cycle life.
Action has been copied to the clipboard

[{ "id":"me.i38.gesture.BeautifySwitchService", "label":"Micro gesture switch", "desc":"Trigger a Micro Gesture switch", "type": "switch", "para":[{"name":"action","label":"Switch","type":"choice","choices":{"value":["Q","R","t","K","p"],"label":["Keep screen on","Touch protector","Force landscape","Force portrait","Pause gesture"]}}] }, { "id":"me.i38.gesture.BeautifyActionService", "label":"Micro gesture action", "desc":"Run any Micro Gesture action", "para":[{"name":"action","label":"action","desc":"Copy code from Micro Gesture panel editor here.","type":"text","required": true}] }]
Customizable quick tiles with seamless integration with Micro Gesture.
Why are some actions (such as scanning QR code) that can not be triggered when Micro Gesture is in the background, but can be triggered in the foreground?

Some Android phones have permission to control the pop-up interface when the app is in the background. On these phones, you need to enable the corresponding permissions. For example, on the Xiaomi devices, you need to open the background pop-up permission of Micro Gesture.
Element is not clickable, please try to simulate a click.
Volume button trigger under screen off
Move cursor Click to view and copy
You can not create more than 12 gestures.
Touch protection even if screen off
FragMemory can study any anki library when using phone.
Account version requires an internet connection, but you can change devices after activation.
Setting a double gesture will cause a slight delay in single gesture.
Up to how many gestures can be created?

You can add new gestures by Add button in the upper right corner. The gesture can have three axes of rotation, each axis can have positive and negative direction, and each direction can support single and double rotation, so a total of 12 independent gestures can be created.
Works only when the screen is on
Sorry, the machine does not detect the hardware gyroscope, the rotation gesture may not work, but the physical key trigger is not affected.
Why are there sometimes noticeable delays in triggering certain actions from home screen?

This is a design of Google in Android 10. In order to prevent users from being popped up by background app when they press home to return to the home, a five-second delay is forced. This restriction was removed on Android 12.
How to keep the background of Micro Gesture not being cleaned up?
Micro Gesture need to run in the background to continuously detect gestures, please set the correct settings by phone manufacturer.
Volume keys or other custom keys
Delay between two Recent for last task
Micro Gesture can recognize various gestures such as rotating the phone to trigger actions, click the switch above to start/stop.
The background triggering app is blocked on MIUI, please enable the Display pop-up windows in background permission.
Why the volume adjustment can not be popped up?
Some devices such as Xiaomi need to set the [media volume control] permission to [always allow] first, otherwise it will cause the volume adjustment not to work.
File not found or permission denied.
Notification permission is required to display the status and action for %1$s.
Number of recent apps in panel
Panel can be used for any gesture
An app is obscuring a permissions request, why?
This is because there is a floating window in the permission request page. Temporarily close the floating App and you can finish the permission request.
Explore the phone parameters, hardware test and benchmark.
No pixel matching permission, please enable it in Lab.
Pixel matching allows exact matching by pixel color on screen in Super Shortcut for enhanced automation, you need to re-authorize after each reboot.
Can not connect to google play store
Be careful to set plugin. Improper settings can cause execution exceptions.
You can add a Quick Setting tile for Mirco gesture to make it easier to enable/disable gesture.
Can be left blank, match only specific events to optimize performance and reduce the impact on the clicked app, the value can be copied from the class attribute in the history.

Can be left blank, used to filter the result elements, the filter is divided by semicolon, the conditions can be v(visible), c(clickable), e(editable), w(width), h(height), x/y(center Coordinate),x1/x2/y1/y2(left/right/top/bottom coordinate), for example, v=1;x1>100 means that visible elements and x1 is greater than 100.
To prevent repeated triggering, set this interval in milliseconds, with positive values indicating a delay after the trigger and negative values a delay before the trigger.
Delay to unlock, execute only once
Please enter the text to be included, or ! plus a regular expression, leave blank to match all notifications.

Please enter the text to be matched strictly, or use wavy symbols with fuzzy matching text, e.g.: ~close, or # plus the id of the element.
If above match failed, use ^ plus full text.
Automatically click or perform custom actions

Micro Gesture requires accessibility services permission to perform actions like back, multitasking, notification etc.
We do not collect any personal information through accessiblity services.
Basic service cover most of the features of Micro Gesture, such as rotate your phone to perform Back,Home,Recent actions.
Why some gestures are difficult to trigger?

There are two possibilities, one is the phone does not have a hardware gyroscope, in this case the sensor data given by the phone is not accurate enough to affect the recognition rate, if the gyroscope is no problem, please refer to the demo video to confirm whether the gesture action is accurate and consistent, most users can do a very accurate gesture recognition rate after a little learning.
It is recommended to lock the App first, then enable this switch.
The following are the gesture label and parameters, parameters are in order of x1,y1,x2,y2... and elapsed time(ms), please modify if necessary
Please switch to the app you want to record the gesture immediately, the screen will turn red after about 5 seconds, and then record the gesture you want.
Get better vibration on some phones
Some phones prohibit background pop-up prompts, so this may not work.
You need a permission to enable the App advanced feature.
If want trig by user defined key, press the key now
Like rotating phone on a table
